channel.title: Serenity: Reborn | Player Owned Shop | Task System | PvM Rewars | Rank System |
channel.description:
[center][b][center][img]http://www.serenity718.com/images/serenity69.png[/img]
Welcome to Serenity: Reborn
About Serenity Serenity has been around for about 3 years now. We have had our ups and downs but we usually get through them. Serenity was first owned by Colin. In the 562 ages, then I came along and asked to help develop. This was way before I joined RuneLocus or R-S. Then I quit Colin's server and a couple weeks after that he quit Serenity. So then, I re-made serenity using Noszscape 562 and it's been going ever since. Now it is owned by me and my friend named Kyle. We both hope to see you online soon.
Development Team Xiles @Nexus Coding
Features Duel Arena Pest Control Castle Wars World Events Dungeoneering Player Owned Shops Quests Constant Development No Lag PvM Rewards Ancient Effigys Online 24/7 Promotional Ranks Trivia System Animations for Skilling and Teleporting And More!
Links Vote for Serenity [url=http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-36142.html]http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-36142.html[/url] Serenity Forums [url=http://www.serenity718.com/forums]http://www.serenity718.com/forums[/url] Download Serenity [url=http://www.serenity718.com/play/Serenity.jar]http://www.serenity718.com/play/Serenity.jar[/url] Serenity Webclient [url=http://www.serenity718.com/play/webclient.html]http://www.serenity718.com/play/webclient.html[/url]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MpPRJV0Y4Bc[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2sJeRZ2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/V1oOooO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1djW6Wn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gi0bnwU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KOtzwzk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4Qlplkz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XHBb1Bp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dDomvq3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/68F17jx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/a5DwURv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/itpazl2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/H4Dwk7N.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tHACaFE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DHqZvrK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jciwk8Z.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6fbrAKg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ITN1zCl.png[/img][/center][/b][/center]
